definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Cut the shrimps in half and marinate with pinchof salt and pepper for about 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 虾仁切半，用一小撮食盐和胡椒粉腌制5分钟。

sentences.english: Shred chicken, stir in salt and white pepper. Stand for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 先将鸡肉切丝，再加入盐及胡椒粉，腌约15分钟。

sentences.english: Pepper, Chilli, Coriander Leaf, Cloves , Herbal Spices (Organic.
sentences.chinese: 采购产品胡椒粉，智利，芫荽叶，丁香，草药的药料。

sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食盐，柠檬汁，孜然粉，橄榄油和胡椒粉调味。

sentences.english: He wanted a little more pepper to spice up his rump steak.
sentences.chinese: 他想再加一点胡椒粉给他的菲力牛排调味。

sentences.english: Add additional cracked pepper and the grated cheese.
sentences.chinese: 另外还可加些胡椒粉和磨碎的乳酪。

sentences.english: Omelette or you can sprinkle in some pepper, fine salt.
sentences.chinese: 在煎蛋时或可以洒些胡椒粉，细盐。

sentences.english: She sprinkled pepper on my grub, watching me nosh.
sentences.chinese: 她在我的食物上撒了点胡椒粉，看着我吃。

sentences.english: Add salt, pepper, and chopped parsley.
Season shredded beef with salt and pepper. Marinate for a while and saute till cooked.
sentences.chinese: 牛柳条以适量盐及胡椒粉调味，腌片刻后炒熟。

sentences.english: Add the wine, mint or thyme, salt, and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加入干白，薄荷或百里香，盐，胡椒粉。

sentences.english: When they are done, salt with crystalized seas salt and sprinkle with some pepper.
sentences.chinese: 菜做好了，加入适量的盐，再撒一些胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I enjoy beetroot and kale smoothies with a dash of turmeric and ground pepper.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢甜菜根和甘蓝奶昔，外加少许姜黄和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: The white vinegar, tomato paste, sugar, salt, pepper transferred into the juice.
sentences.chinese: 将白醋，番茄酱，糖，盐，胡椒粉调成汁。

sentences.english: Mix minced pork with light soya sauce, white pepper, sesame oil and egg together.
sentences.chinese: 将猪肉碎，酱清，白胡椒粉，麻油，和鸡蛋混合搅拌。

sentences.english: Arrange the tomato slices on the waffle. Sprinkle with salt and pepper。
sentences.chinese: 烤华夫饼干，番茄片放在饼干上，洒一点胡椒粉和盐。

definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
